## About me 


* **Current Position**: I am a tenure-track assistant professor (RTT) in Statistics (S.S.D. STAT-01/A) at the
[Department of Economics, Management and Statistics](https://dems.unimib.it/en) of [University of Milano - Bicocca](https://en.unimib.it/). 
* **Research Interests**: Spatial and spatio-temporal models for data on linear networks.
* **Email Address**: andrea.gilardi@unimib.it
* **Present Address**: University of Milano - Bicocca, Department of Economics, Management and Statistics, Via Bicocca degli Arcimboldi, 8 - 20100 Milano (IT) - building U7.
